This PowerPoint slide explores insights into the unconscious drivers behind the growing generation of electronic waste, with a particular focus on mobile phones, laptops, and other communication devices. As these technologies continue to evolve rapidly in the past decade and become more widely accessible, this advancement is simultaneously accelerating the production of e-waste. Factors that causes this includes both business and consumers psychology.
